answer:
In BC, the end of September is not too early to get a influenza vaccine (flu shot). Most BC locations will not have influenza vaccine available until October/November. Use our locator to Find an Influenza (Flu) Clinic near you.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, the end of September is not too early to get a influenza vaccine (flu shot).


## Most BC locations will not have influenza vaccine available until October/November.

Use our locator to Find an Influenza (Flu) Clinic near you.
Immunization Nurse
question: Is it too early to get a flu shot?
